Header.title: CAMHIRE
Header.paragraph: We narrate your stories incredibly with pictures as we capture excitement and emotionsin one frame. The humble talent at Camhire will beautifully document joyful momentsof your life..

About.paragraph: Three years back, five mavericks saw a dream to take a journey off-beat from what theywere doing and jumped into a pool of creating stories by capturing moments. One day while sitting in the backyard, one of the stakeholders, also a passionate photographer, pondered the endless hurdles in the business world of photography. Whether it was about finding the best photographers from different corners of the country or picking the apt one according to your style. Camhire is an endeavour to overcome all those barriers and fulfil that very motive of photography. We help photographers and freelancers connect with clients all over Indiato provide desired services.Camhire started off as an expression of Surajâ€™s hunger for creativity to buildphotographic content by using different lenses. Adding to his passion for the trueessence of photography, Kuldeep and Yash brought their technical and financial minds,respectively. The marketing brain behind the lenses came forward with the emerging entrepreneur, Simar, who lent all his wisdom to turn a vision into a brand. Camhire became a perfect amalgamation of all the business skills and creative interests.Inspired to look at the world through camera lenses, a venture was born that aims to capture the beauty of human emotions in their truest form.
Why: We help photographers connect with clients.
We are an intermediate third-party guarantee between photographer and their client.
We minimize fraud done by both parties.
Why2: We provide 100% satisfactory deals between both parties.
We help scale the photography industry.
We monitor content and innovate gradually.

Features.title: Third-Party Services
Features.text: We offer you the best third-party services by assuring zero fraud and 100% satisfactory deals.

Features.title: Onboarding Genuine Photographers
Features.text: We bring to you genuine and vetted photographers who are experts in the services they offer..

Features.title: Know Your Photographers Inside Out
Features.text: Know every single detail about your photographer before you freeze them.

Features.title: Book Photographers From Anywhere In India
Features.text: From Kashmir to Kanyakumari, you get the benefit of booking photographers from any corner of India.
